participant_1.name: Mary
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and friendly, Mary loves connecting with others and enjoys outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: My favorite band is One Direction. I love to hike in the summer and ski in the winter. My name is Mary and I am from Colorado.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and sociable, David enjoys spending time with friends and exploring new experiences.
participant_2.background: I like to drive for hours. I used to smoke. I cannot live without my friends. I have 10 piercings.

content.text: Hello!
Hey there!
My name is Mary and I'm from Colorado.
Nice to meet you, Mary. I'm David and I'm from Kansas.
What are some of your hobbies?
I like to drive for hours, I used to smoke, I cannot live without my friends, and I have 10 piercings.
Wow, that's a lot of piercings! I don't have any piercings myself.
I like them. They make me feel more confident.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go out with my friends and have a good time. I also like to watch movies and play video games.
I love to go out with my friends too. We usually go to the movies or play board games.
I've never been much of a board game person. I'm more of a video game person.
I like video games too. What are some of your favorite games?
I love the Call of Duty series. I also like the Halo series and the Assassin's Creed series.
I've never played any of those games. I'm more of a Mario and Zelda person.
I've never played any of those games either.
We should play some time!
That would be fun!
Great! We should exchange numbers.
Sounds good!
